mapper.select: SELECT username, password, roleId, available FROM t_user WHERE username = #{userName}
SELECT t_permission.* FROM t_permission LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM t_role_permission) role ON role.sys_role_id = #{roleId} WHERE t_permission.type = 'menu' AND t_permission.id = role.sys_permission_id
SELECT t_permission.* FROM t_permission LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM t_role_permission) role ON role.sys_role_id = #{roleId} WHERE t_permission.type != 'menu' AND t_permission.id = role.sys_permission_id

SELECT permission.name title, permission.icon, permission.id pid, parentid, permission.url href FROM t_permission permission LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM t_role_permission) role ON role.sys_role_id = #{roleId} WHERE type = "menu" AND role.sys_permission_id = permission.id ORDER BY parentid ASC

SELECT permission.name title, permission.icon, permission.id pid FROM t_permission permission LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM t_role_permission) role ON role.sys_role_id = #{roleId} WHERE parentid = 1 AND role.sys_permission_id = permission.id

SELECT permission.name title, permission.icon, permission.id pid, permission.url href FROM t_permission permission LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM t_role_permission) role ON role.sys_role_id = #{roleId} WHERE permission.id = role.sys_permission_id AND parentid = #{parentId}
